title: Truss Tone-Deaf on Scotland
itunes:title: Truss Tone-Deaf on Scotland
description:
Truss has a shocking devil-may-care attitude to nearest neighbours, says Wendy Chamberlain, Liberal Democrat MP and the party's chief whip. She discusses energy prices, tax cuts and another Scottish referendum with Bloomberg's Caroline Hepker and Lizzy Burden. Plus: Opinion columnist Therese Raphael on whether a Liz Truss premiership could be better than the current low expectations. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
